name: Empires:The Rise
description: 《Empries:The Rise》 is the a Cross-Platform Real-Time-Strategy (R.T.S.) game. Choose your nation and conquer those, who stand in your way!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: R5 230 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GT 1030 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1200 MB available space
